bibl.author: Fukita, Takamichi
bibl.title: Soreyue ima Ānanda yo – 'jikie, Hōkie' no seppou saikō –
Therefore Now Ānanda – A Reconsideration of the Preaching of Atta-saraṇa and Dhamma-saraṇa –

imprint.title: Bukkyō gaku jōdogaku kenkyū, Kagawa Kōyū Hakushi koki kinen ronbunshū
Buddhology and Studies of Pure Land Buddhism, Festschrift for Prof. Kōyū Kagawa's 70th birthday
